precautions: Do not exceed the dose specified: if this drug is taken above the dosage indicated, certain side effects may be significant in many situations.Before use, read the label carefully: the guidelines should be straightforward for the patient before taking the drug.Keep out of control of children and minors: This drug should not be prescribed to minors because it is a sort of potent medicine that can affect many minors’ problems.Stay away from the wet surface of the medicine: ensure it is placed on a dry surface and placed at normal temperature.Keep it out of sunshine: Keep it out of direct sunlight. effects: Many of the side effects of most of the medicines don’t require any sort of medical treatment and vanish as the body responds to the medication. Following are the side effects of Citralka Syrup.Stomach pain: The most common side effect of Citralka Syrup is stomach pain, and there is nothing to worry about this side effect because it gradually gets better with time. If this syrup is consumed for the first time, it can affect the stomach.Frequent urge to urinateAs this medicine is used for the treatment of kidney stones and Gout, it can urge to urinate very frequently because kidney stones make it hard to urinate. This syrup can sometimes cause a frequent urge to urinate.Diarrhoea: Diarrhoea is caused by this type of syrup consuming a heavy dose. It depends primarily on the metabolism of the patient who uses this drug. Citralka Syrup can cause diarrhoea for some time, but it is a very rare side effect.

title: Jetepar Cap 1x20 (L)
details: Endogenous and exogenous intoxications, acute and chronic iiver diseases, hepatic insufficiency, fatty liver degeneration, jaundice, food intoxications, alcoholism, physical and mental overwork.
precautions: Before using this medication, tell your doctor or pharmacist if you are allergic to it; or if you have any other allergies. This product may contain inactive ingredients, which can cause allergic reactions or other problems. Do not consume if allergic to any ingredient in the medicine. Do not use the medicine if suffering from renal or hepatic impairment. If you are self-treating with this medication, it is important to read the package instructions carefully before you start using this product to be sure it is right for you. Drink plenty of clear fluids to help prevent dehydration caused by diarrhea.
effects: Flushing, Increase blood sugar level, Blurred vision, Rash, Elevations in liver funtion test, Dizziness, Diarrhea, GI distress, Liver toxicity

title: Orglu Tab 3x10 (L)
details: It is a musculotropic anti-spasmodic drug that is used for the treatment of spasmodic pain management arising from the biliary tract, intestine, bladder, or uterus.
precautions: Keep out of the reach of children. Protect from heat, sunlight, and humidity. Store at room temperature, i.e. below 25 degrees Celsius. Don't use it after the expiration date. Avoid it if you're hypersensitive to any of its ingredients.
effects: In rare cases, it may cause mild to moderate adverse reactions. In the case of side effects, discontinue the use and try to find a doctor. Some common Side effects include skin irritations, itching, rashes, redness, and swelling on the skin, etc. It may also cause digestive problems, i.e. bloating, gas, diarrhea, constipation, GERD (gastroesophageal reflux disease), nausea, and vomiting, etc. Consult a doctor, if you have hypersensitivity to any of its ingredients. Other adverse reactions are drowsiness, dizziness, headache, loss of appetite, behavior changes, chest pain, etc.

precautions: It is essential to read all the precautionary measures before taking any medication to avoid any harmful effects. The mandatory ketosteril tablets precautions are described below.Do not use ketosteril tablets if you are allergic to any of its ingredients.Inform your doctor of your medical history, allergies, and medication you are already using.Do not use the medication and inform your doctor if you are a patient of phenylketonuria as the tablets contain phenylalanine.Inform your doctor if you are already using any calcium-containing drug or supplement to avoid harmful drug interactions.Do not use the medication if you have hypercalcemia.Do not use ketosteril tablets if you have disordered amino acid metabolism.Use the tablets only on a doctor's prescription if you are pregnant.Use the tablets only on a doctor's prescription if you are breastfeeding.People having gastrointestinal problems or a history of it should use the tablets with extreme caution.The ketosteril tablets must be used with extreme caution in patients with asthma or severe allergies.While consuming the tablets the patient is suggested to consume food containing 40 grams of protein per day.Keep the tablets away from the reach of children.Place it in a cool, dry, and safe place.Use With Caution if you are Allergic to it's ingredients.
effects: The possible ketosteril tablets side effects are listed below. It is not necessary that you will experience all of the side effects. you may experience few or none.
